name: Swing Boi
description:
Swing your boi across the screen!

Controls:

AD - Horizontal Movement and Swinging

Space bar - Jump when standing on a platform

Left click in the direction you want to fire your grapple

Right click to let go of current object.

Q - Lengthen the rope to allow for a bigger swinging circle

E - Reels in the rope for a smaller swinging circle

Hold E to shoot yourself off the hook
